properties.context: handheld device is powered on through specific button sequence
device must be powered on before LGV connection
connection attempt initiates pairing verification process
yellow light flashes indicate pairing status
password required for security authentication
emergency stop is part of safety reset procedure
deadman switch is a component of handheld controller
password required for handheld login
holding deadman switch enables LGV connection
F5 button activates synchro steering
login must complete before LGV connection
LGV must be inserted into correct position at ASRS dock
LGV must face forward direction according to dock position
Search segment operation must be performed
Position verification must occur before enabling autoinsert
Segment search must be completed before enabling autoinsert
K1 button press initiates unpairing sequence
K4 button press initiates unpairing sequence
K1+K4 press must happen before unpair click
Auto mode required for LGV reset
LGV 4 is paired with base station
